overview: In Extase' ('In Ecstacy') takes you on a journey through the fascinating world of Dance music. House, Techno, Hardcore, Trance, from the underground scene in a squatter's village to the immense Amsterdam Arena filled with 40,000 people all dressed in white, you'll get the ultimate insider's experience.
tagline: Experiende Dance Music From The Inside
title: In Ecstacy
